name: Space GELD
description:
You're deeply indebted to the space federation's semi-legal loanshark branch. Fly out into space to collect resources and pay back your debt or use them to upgrade your ship, enraging the federation's paramilitary fighters - your choice. Deeper into Space, Deeper into Debt, Deeper into trouble. Take care not to spend too much fuel while mining. Getting towed will cost you all your resources!

Controls: Steering: W,A,S,D Thrust: Shift Fire: Left Mouse Button
